Grupus (Dragon/?)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): CD/DVD List: Dragon: Grupus (Dragon/?)
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, March 28, 2002 - 08:41 pm:

It is one of the monsters on MR Hop A Bout. But since most of the other Pandora monsters have shown up on CDs we have left this section open so that people could post them if they find them.
